name: Parlak Zambak
description: Liyue'de yaygın olarak görüldüğü söylenen son derece kadim bir çiçek. Çiçeklenme sırasında toprağın hatıralarını kokuya dönüştürür.
source: พบได้ในโลกกว้าง
คำแนะนำ: หาได้ที่ Yujing Terrace ในท่าเรือ Liyue
คำแนะนำ: หาได้ที่หมู่บ้าน Qingce
Öneri: Yujing Terası ve Liyue Limanı'nda bulunur.
